title: Ep. 9 - Captain Annoying
description:
On today's show, the guys discuss a police officer getting arrested for forging divorce documents, the first ever electric scooter DUI, and their thoughts on Sylvester Stallone suiting back up in a new Rambo movie. Todd wants to know what the guys would choose as their three superpowers if they were a superhero named Captain Annoying, the guys choose who they're taking shots with or at and answer some listener questions. To close out the show, the guys choose a couple of Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Come have a good time with us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
